town_halls.title: ERA Town Hall Meeting
town_halls.summary:
*Meeting with Enabling The Future*

# ERA Town Hall Meeting

**Date:** July 31, 2024 | **Duration:** 119 mins

**Links:** [View Meeting](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=view_recording_link&utm_medium=email) | [Ask Fathom](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=ask_fathom&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=ask_fathom&utm_medium=email)

## ACTION ITEMS ✨

- [ ] [Consider Abigail for relevant projects and opportunities](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=1760.4999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Help develop Panama Canal watershed restoration project](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=2953.6998989999997&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Present concept of climate transition agency and give presentation next week about it](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=2998.3999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Collaborate on developing educational resources for Eco Restoration Alliance website and present proposal for ecological restoration project in Hella Wilderness area](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=5508.539898999999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)


## Meeting purpose

## Key Takeaways

- [Introductions of new and existing members, including backgrounds and areas of focus](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=31.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Presentations on diverse topics like cosmic labyrinths, indigenous agroforestry, soil health, land restoration](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=50.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Discussion of potential collaborations and educational initiatives](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=783.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Plan for focused presentation on Colorado River project next week](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=801.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Topics

### Introductions and Member Updates

- [New members Anna Calderon (climate diplomacy, Panama Canal project) and Kathleen Groppe (soil health, regenerative agriculture) introduced themselves](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=1273.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Existing members like Indy, Kwaki, Evan, Jacob provided updates on their work](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=835.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Indy's Presentation - Cosmic Labyrinths

- [Promoting play, laughter and embodied diversity in ecological restoration](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=3003.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Hosting eco-festivals, building "sacred eco-toilets", creating interactive playbooks](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=3240.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Vision of an "eco-Disney" celebrating cultural mythologies](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=3822.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Based in LA but working across locations](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=3900.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Kwaki's Presentation - Indigenous Agroforestry

- [Synchropic agroforestry accelerates ecological succession through pruning techniques](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=4810.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Curricula on agroecology, decolonization for K-12 education](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=5265.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Project proposal for regenerative grazing in Hella Wilderness area](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=5752.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Kathleen's Presentation - Soil Health

- [Converted degraded land into restored prairie with lake through trash removal, cattle grazing](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=6566.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Studying impact of plant diversity on soil microorganisms](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=6880.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Education plans for high schoolers and book on regenerative agriculture](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=6055.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Next Steps

- [Kwaki to present focused proposal on Hella Wilderness project next week](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=4184.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Evan Lam to present on "climate transition agency" concept](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=722.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Explore collaborations like hosting Cosmic Labyrinths at events, sharing educational resources](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=1410.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Recruit more members aligned with ERA's multidisciplinary approach](https://fathom.video/share/i1gcZD_whDRnrr268zn8ssyis-aTZyr9?tab=summary&timestamp=1452.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
